name: House Out of Town
overview: Being a solicitor is not without its problems. One of the most difficult tasks to befall you in your profession is the organizing of wills. In HOUSE OUT OF TOWN, you play Mr Parker, quite experienced in your trade, who has been asked to sort out the last will and testament of a Mr Dickens. The only problem is the whereabouts of the will, rumor has it that it is hidden in the late Mr Dickens' house that lies out of town.
